nodes.text: There was a security checkpoint positioned outside the Jedi Temple on Coruscant. In 19 BBY, it was presumably destroyed in Operation: Knightfall.

In 41 BBY, Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn came to this checkpoint to speak with the Jedi Knight in charge of the checkpoint. Jinn hurriedly demanded to know the location of fellow Jedi Master Tahl. The Knight could not find her and could not contact her on her comlink. This led Jinn to assume Tahl was either in the Room of a Thousand Fountains or in a session of the Jedi High Council.
